summary: Cyrus: From now on, we will be using code names. You can address me as Eagle One. Jonah, code name -- Been There, Done That. TJ...
body:
Cyrus: From now on, we will be using code names. You can address me as Eagle One. Jonah, code name – Been There, Done That. TJ is – Currently Doing That. Walker is – It Happened Once in a Dream. Buffy, code name – If I Had to Pick a Girl. Andi is – Eagle Two.

Andi: Oh thank God.

reblog.comment:
Cyrus: From now on, we will be using code names. You can address me as Eagle One. Jonah, code name – Been There, Done That. TJ is – Currently Doing That. Walker is – It Happened Once in a Dream. Buffy, code name – If I Had to Pick a Girl. Andi is – Eagle Two.

Andi: Oh thank God.

Andi: Oh thank God.

Cyrus: From now on, we will be using code names. You can address me as Eagle One. Jonah, code name – Been There, Done That. TJ is – Currently Doing That. Walker is – It Happened Once in a Dream. Buffy, code name – If I Had to Pick a Girl. Andi is – Eagle Two.

Andi: Oh thank God.

blog.name: andimackkkkkk
blog.title: K-
blog.description:
Tyrus is endgame.

Muffy is endgame.

Wonah is endgame

Jonah and mental stability is endgame.

The end.

summary: I STAN
body:
I feel like people are confused about what I mean when I say I am a “Reed Stan”

I don’t stan 13 year old boys who steal their fathers guns and think it’s cool to play around with them.

I don’t stan 13 year old boys who may or may not get high

I stan 13 year old boys who don’t really understand the seriousness of gun violence and nicotine addictions because they’ve never had it properly explained to them. All they’ve ever seen is the badass action movies of Will Smith or some other Hollywood actor looking cool as hell with bullets flying everywhere. And they just want their friends to think they’re cool so they figure, hey why not ? Let’s go shoot up some watermelons, what’s the likely possibility we’ll accidently shoot eachother or some other innocent victim ?? He doesn’t understand the danger of the situation, and yeah he’s being stupid and reckless but he’s not a bad kid

I stan a 13 year old kid who’s going to learn a valuable lesson, and teach it to his children, and become a better person because of it. I stan a 13 year old kid who is gonna help teach a lot of other 13 year old kids that same lesson, and potentially save some lives.


I STAN

summary: I’m not gonna be able to articulate this well so I apologize, but I think the thing I love about the scene with TJ and his...
body:
I’m not gonna be able to articulate this well so I apologize, but I think the thing I love about the scene with TJ and his friends is the fact that it portrayed a typical group of teenage boys but they did it in a way that didn’t revert to the terrible trope of having them make homphobic comments or rating girls on a scale of 1-10 or making offhand sexist comments.

Like, of course the gun thing was bad, but it was more just a dumb mistake they made rather than a reflection of their characters as a whole.

That’s the thing I love most about Andi Mack; every character is three-dimensional. They’re not perfect, they make mistakes, but at their core, they’re good people and we’re shown that by their actions and how they rectify their mistakes.

It’s just really refreshing to see.

That’s the thing I love most about Andi Mack; every character is three-dimensional. They’re not perfect, they make mistakes, but at their core, they’re good people and we’re shown that by their actions and how they rectify their mistakes.

blog.name: amberplusandi
blog.title: don't worry, bambi
blog.description: [leah, she/her, read my tags]

tags: watch me lose followers for this 😔👊
tumblr is WAY too apologetic of andi and her actions
summary: no ones gonna say it so i guess i have to
body:
no ones gonna say it so i guess i have to

andi going out with jonah despite knowing cyrus had a crush on him yet getting mad at buffy for going out with someone she specifically said she didn’t like anymore is the most hypocritical thing i’ve ever heard

the “she’s only thirteen” excuse is such bullshit because no other kid on the show acts the way she does or treats their friends the way she treats hers

if you justify andi dating jonah after cyrus comes out to her by saying that she knew he’d never have a chance with him you’re not only calling her homophobic and biphobic but you’re being those things yourself

when buffy moved away all andi could think of was how much it hurt her, despite buffy clearly being in a much worse situation (even cyrus pointed out how much buffy must be hurting)

stop saying andi’s an uwu godsend did-nothing-wrong angel child. she’s not. at least not right now.
